CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Such a structural modification would be expected the lower - lying LUMO with the HOMO being largely unaffected due to the individual effects of the smaller ionization potential ( IP ) and almost the same electronegativity of selenium relative to sulfur atom.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| LUMO (Lower-lying Lumo) |
| HOMO (Higher-lying Orbital or Homo) |
| Selenium |
| Sulfur atom |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| LUMO (Lower-lying Lumo) |
| HOMO (Higher-lying Orbital or Homo) |
| Selenium |

The paragraph mentions "such a structural modification would be expected for the lower-lying LUMO," and "selenium relative to sulfur atom." Therefore, "lower-lying LUMO" and "selenium" are the valid material names in the paragraph. The other mentioned entities, "higher-lying orbital or homo" and "sulfur atom," are not material names, but rather descriptions of the material properties.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Such a structural modification would be expected the lower - lying LUMO with the HOMO being largely unaffected due to the individual effects of the smaller ionization potential ( IP ) and almost the same electronegativity of selenium relative to sulfur atom.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| lower-lying LUMO |
| IP (ionization potential) of selenium |
| electronegativity of selenium |
| IP of sulfur atom |
| HOMO (Highest Occupied Molecular Orbital) |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| lower-lying LUMO (Molecular Orbital property) |
| IP (ionization potential) of selenium (Material property) |
| electronegativity of selenium (Chemical property) |
| IP of sulfur atom (Material property) |
| HOMO (Molecular Orbital property) |

Paragraph: Such a structural modification would be expected the lower - lying LUMO with the HOMO being largely unaffected due to the individual effects of the smaller ionization potential ( IP ) and almost the same electronegativity of selenium relative to sulfur atom.

Let's think step by step.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

The entities "lower-lying LUMO" and "HOMO" are not material properties, but rather descriptions of the energy levels of molecular orbitals. Therefore, they are not valid entities for this table.
